<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if the FirstMI meets the constraints of SecondMI according to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcmacrofusion-cpp-/#a148883092b4d2dfdc994bc095ec153d7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcmacrofusion-cpp-/#a148883092b4d2dfdc994bc095ec153d7">checkOpConstraints</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcmacrofusion-cpp-/fusionfeature/#a9180da3be917e7829faaffae67e7ac05">FusionFeature::FusionKind</a> Kd,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;FirstMI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;SecondMI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Kd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The hardware didn&#39;t require any specific check for the fused instructions&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operands. Therefore, return true to indicate that, it is fusable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">: </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;addi rt,ra,si - lxvd2x xt,ra,rb&#93; etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FusionFeature::FK&#95;AddiLoad: &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sioptimizeexecmaskingprera-cpp/#a3e47bdb3e296b00df96eff7896fa57bf">RA</a>.getReg().isVirtual() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = FirstMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If si = 1111111111110000 and the msb of the d/ds field of the load equals</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1, then fusion does not occur.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Imm &amp; 0xFFF0) == 0xFFF0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = SecondMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 14 bit for DS field, while 16 bit for D field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MSB = 15;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SecondMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == PPC::LD)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check if the instr pair, FirstMI and SecondMI, should be fused together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given SecondMI, when FirstMI is unspecified, then check if SecondMI may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// part of a fused pair at all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcmacrofusion-cpp-/#a5362d2941268801aae99c4ea089c25cf"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae7edc3c94f26f402d3893490059bcf2a">shouldScheduleAdjacent</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetsubtargetinfo">TargetSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;TSI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;FirstMI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;SecondMI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use the PPC namespace to avoid the need to prefix opcodes with PPC:: in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the def file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc">PPC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a> &amp;ST = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a>&amp;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(TSI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcmacrofusion-cpp-/fusionfeature">FusionFeature</a> FusionFeatures&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  #define FUSION&#95;FEATURE(KIND, HAS&#95;FEATURE, DEP&#95;OP&#95;IDX, OPSET1, OPSET2) &#123; \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    FusionFeature::FUSION&#95;KIND(KIND), ST.HAS&#95;FEATURE(), DEP&#95;OP&#95;IDX, &#123; OPSET1 &#125;,\\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">    &#123; OPSET2 &#125; &#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">   #include &quot;PPCMacroFusion.def&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">  #undef FUSION&#95;KIND</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Feature : FusionFeatures) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip if the feature is not supported.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Feature.isSupported())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only when the SecondMI is fusable, we are starting to look for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fusable FirstMI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Feature.hasOp2(SecondMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If FirstMI == nullptr, that means, we&#39;re only checking whether SecondMI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be fused at all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FirstMI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checking if the FirstMI is fusable with the SecondMI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Feature.hasOp1(FirstMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DepOpIdx = Feature.depOpIdx();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DepOpIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checking if the result of the FirstMI is the desired operand of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SecondMI if the DepOpIdx is set. Otherwise, ignore it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcmacrofusion-cpp-/#aafc3cb0155754ef1fb6ed53375e4d3dd">matchingRegOps</a>(&#42;FirstMI, 0, SecondMI, &#42;DepOpIdx))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checking more on the instruction operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcmacrofusion-cpp-/#a148883092b4d2dfdc994bc095ec153d7">checkOpConstraints</a>(Feature.getKind(), &#42;FirstMI, SecondMI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab4d3cea5bfc82fb91c1f20351f7ef351"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;ScheduleDAGMutation&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab4d3cea5bfc82fb91c1f20351f7ef351">createPowerPCMacroFusionDAGMutation</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1b646d2ebeba4a7119c3d4fec4d137dc">createMacroFusionDAGMutation</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae7edc3c94f26f402d3893490059bcf2a">shouldScheduleAdjacent</a>);</span></CodeLine>
